EXIT   X

THE RISK OF MONEY LAUNDERING

Page

Table of Contents

 

As you learned in Module 1, reporting entities have five key obligations under the Anti-Money Laundering and Counter- Terrorism Financing Act (the AML/CTF Act).

Establish and maintain an AML/CTF program

Keep records

Conduct customer identification and verification of identity

Conduct ongoing customer due diligence

Report in relation to suspicious matters, threshold transactions and international funds transfer instructions

This module focuses on the first obligation: establishing and maintaining an AML/CTF program.
